title: ‘Queen of Flanders’ Lotte Kopecky Powers to Historic Third Win in Tour of Flanders Women
content:
Home hero Kopecky outsprints Ferrand-Prévot, Lippert, Niewiadoma for record-breaking hat trick at De Ronde.

Read the full article at ‘Queen of Flanders’ Lotte Kopecky Powers to Historic Third Win in Tour of Flanders Women on Velo.
author: sstokes
